trans-unit.source: Defines a compensatable version of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: Define uma versão compensável da atividade <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity> implements the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ICompensatableActivity> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity> implementa a interface <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ICompensatableActivity>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Compensation SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é do exemplo de compensação SDK.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Compensation Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [exemplo de compensação](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que gerencie o evento.

trans-unit.source: The previously typed event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos do evento com tipo anterior.

trans-unit.source: Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Define o procedimento de processamento quando o evento subscribed-to ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> for the operation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> para a operação.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to compensate an activity that is in the <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus.Closed" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho para compensar uma atividade que está no estado <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus.Closed" />.

trans-unit.source: The activity must have a value of <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult.Succeeded" /> for its <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionResult" /> property in order to be compensatable.
trans-unit.target: A atividade deve ter um valor de <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult.Succeeded" /> para sua propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionResult" /> para ser compensável.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> after operation has been tried.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> depois que a operação foi tentada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTransactionOptions" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTransactionOptions" /> associado a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTransactionOptions" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTransactionOptions" /> associado a esta instância.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como acessar a propriedade TransactionOptions.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é do exemplo de compensação SDK.
